        Method to create staff account
        Parameters:
        activityUser - the activity user
        newUsername - the staff username
        newPassword - the staff password
        newUserType - the staff user's type
        newLocked - the staff account's locked status
        newFirstName - the staff first name
        newLastName - the staff last name
        newEmail - the staff email address
        newAddress - the staff physical address
        newHomePhone - the staff home phone number
        newCellPhone - the staff cell phone
        dateOfBirth - the staff date of birth
        dateOfHire -
        newGender - the staff gender
        jobStatus - the staff job status
        accountStatus - the staff account status
        Returns:
        true when the account has been created

      • createNewInvoice

        public boolean createNewInvoice(java.lang.String username,
                                java.lang.String patientId,
                                java.lang.String subTotal,
                                java.lang.String taxRate,
                                java.lang.String taxableAmount,
                                java.lang.String total,
                                java.lang.String billAddress,
                                java.lang.String description)
                         throws java.sql.SQLException
        Method to create new Invoice
        Parameters:
        username - user who does function
        patientId - patient id
        subTotal - sub total
        taxRate - tax rate
        taxableAmount - tax amount
        total - total
        billAddress - bill address
        description - description
        Returns:
        true if successfully, otherwise false
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
